00029 class XQGLWidget: public QGLWidget {

00031     Q_OBJECT

00035         void ViewPos (double);                  //  - distance of viewpoint is changed

00038         XQGLWidget (QWidget * = 0);
00039         bool SetDrawObject (GLObject *obj) {
00040             DrawObject = obj;
00041             return *DrawObject;
00042         }
00043         bool SetDrawObject (GLuint list) {
00044             DrawObject = new GLObject (list);
00045             return *DrawObject;
00046         }
00047 
00048         void SetBackgroundColor (const VecMath::Vector<4> &RGBA) {
00049             Background = RGBA;
00050         }
00051 
00052         void SetBackgroundColor (float R, float G, float B, float A) {
00053             Background = VecMath::Vector<4> (R, G, B, A);
00054         }
00056         bool &getColors() { return colors; }
00058         bool &getShade() { return shade; }
